starts.title: Start a sentence for the other player to finish
Pretend you are a mirror image of the other player

examples.title: Take turns adding words to create a silly sentence together
examples.extra: Make the sentence rhyme

examples.title: Sing a duet of a popular song together
examples.extra: Improvise new lyrics to the song

examples.title: Draw a portrait of each other without looking at the paper
examples.extra: Use your non-dominant hand for drawing

examples.title: Create a short story together, each adding one sentence at a time
examples.extra: Make it a fantasy adventure story

examples.title: Perform a short improv scene as characters you both know
examples.extra: Switch characters halfway through the scene

examples.title: Write a haiku together about the current moment
examples.extra: Make it a slightly sensual haiku

examples.title: Act out a famous movie scene together
examples.extra: Add your own creative twist to the ending

examples.title: Create a dance routine to a song of your choice
examples.extra: Incorporate a dip or lift into the dance

examples.title: Whisper a secret fantasy to each other
examples.extra: Act out the fantasy with gestures only

examples.title: Roleplay a romantic restaurant scene together
examples.extra: Include feeding each other dessert

examples.title: Create a sensual poem together, alternating lines
examples.extra: Whisper the poem to each other intimately

examples.title: Improvise a slow dance to music only you can hear
examples.extra: Slow dance together

examples.title: Act out a steamy scene from a romance novel
examples.extra: Add your own creative dialogue

examples.title: Collaborate a fantasy story about being stranded on a desert island
examples.extra: Make it increasingly romantic and sensual

examples.title: Roleplay a phone sex conversation with someone trying to call tech support
examples.extra: Make it increasingly explicit

examples.title: Create a sensual dance routine together
examples.extra: Incorporate body contact and close movements

examples.title: Create a sensual striptease routine together
examples.extra: Incorporate props and creative movements

examples.title: Roleplay a fantasy of being caught in a passionate moment
examples.extra: Make the scene increasingly intense and creative

examples.title: Roleplay acting out a softcore porn scene together
examples.extra: Add your own creative twists and dialogue

examples.title: One player performs a creative lapdance for the other player
examples.extra: Include guided touching during the lapdance
